original_title: Simon sagt Auf Wiedersehen zu seiner Vorhaut
overview: Simon Gr√ºnberg (12) never cared for his Jewish heritage, while his divorced parents bicker whether he should to his bar mithzva as father Frank wants, or save his foreskin as mother Hannah holds. When he falls in love at first sight of the new 'rabbi' Rebecca, Ben decides to join the preparatory religious class hoping to win her.
title: Simon Says Goodbye to His Foreskin
